pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ordinal Dominance Statistics // Computes ordinal, statistics and effect sizes as an alternative to mean comparison: Cliff's delta or success rate difference (SRD), Vargha and Delaney's A or the Area Under a Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve (AUC), the discrete type of McGraw Wong's Common Language Effect Size (CLES) or Grissom Kim's Probability of Superiority (PS), and the Number needed to treat (NNT) effect size. Moreover, comparisons to Cohen's d are offered based on Huberty Lowman's Percentage of Group (Non-)Overlap considerations.
